Reusable Tape Dispenser: Design a reusable tape dispenser that uses a spool of tape instead of individual rolls, reducing waste and making it more environmentally friendly.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Scissors: Integrate a small pair of scissors into the tape dispenser to allow users to cut tape without having to switch to another tool.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Measuring Tool: Add a small ruler or measuring tool to the tape dispenser to allow users to measure distances with precision.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Pencil Holder: Add a small pencil holder to the tape dispenser to keep pens and pencils organized and within reach.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Eraser: Integrate an eraser into the tape dispenser to allow users to easily remove tape residue without having to switch to another tool.
